## What needs improvement?
Describe which documentation needs to be improved or added.

## Current state
What's currently there (or missing)?

## Proposed improvement
What should be added or changed?

## Location
Which file(s) need updating?
- [ ] README.md
- [ ] CONTRIBUTING.md
- [ ] Code comments
- [ ] Docstrings
- [ ] Other: ___________

## Why is this important?
How will this help users or contributors?
